alert_desktop_app_notifications.message: The Pushbullet desktop app is managing notifications.

darkmode_desc.message: An alternative color scheme with a dark background and lighter text.

decryption_failed_body.message: Please confirm your password matches on all devices

encryption_password_needed_body.message: Click here to enter your password

end_to_end_encryption_desc.message: Add additional encryption to protect your personal information even more.

end_to_end_password_desc.message: If you choose to enter a password, this password will need to be entered on each of your devices.

how_to_unmute_app.message: I muted an app, how do I unmute it?

how_to_unmute_app_answer.message: Open the Pushbullet Android app and tap on the 'Notification Mirroring' tab. Here, tap 'Choose which apps to enable', then re-enable the app.

message_placeholder.message: Type a message, press enter to send

message_placeholder_files.message: Type a message or drop a file

message_placeholder_link.message: Add a message, press enter to send

option_allow_instant_push_desc.message: Push the current tab to the chosen device via keyboard shortcut.

option_automatically_attach_link.message: Automatically attach the current tab to messages to a device

option_automatically_attach_link_desc.message: This makes sending links to devices faster.

option_background_permission.message: Keep Pushbullet running when my browser is closed

option_background_permission_desc.message: This will enable you to see your notifications without having to keep a browser window open.

option_clipboard_permission_desc.message: Copy text on one device, then paste it on any other that also has this setting enabled.

option_hosts_permission.message: Enable this if our right-click menu is not working on some websites.

option_hosts_permission_desc.message: Pushbullet needs additional permissions to push images and files from some websites.

option_only_show_titles_desc.message: This will make Pushbullet only show the title of notifications, keeping the message private.

option_open_my_pushes_automatically.message: Open things I push to this browser automatically

option_open_my_pushes_automatically_desc.message: This will make Pushbullet open anything you push to this browser automatically in a new tab.

option_play_sound.message: Play a sound when a notification arrives

option_play_sound_desc.message: This will make Pushbullet play a short sound when a notification arrives, alerting you to it.

option_show_context_menu.message: Show Pushbullet in my browser context menu

option_show_context_menu_desc.message: Show Pushbullet in the list of right-click menu options.

option_show_mirrors_desc.message: Unchecking this will stop us from showing notifications (you can still see a count in our toolbar icon).

option_show_notification_count.message: Show notification count on toolbar icon

option_show_notification_count_desc.message: See your notification count at a glance in your toolbar.

option_tabs_permission.message: Avoid opening multiple tabs for the same website when clicking notifications.

option_tabs_permission_desc.message: Pushbullet needs an additional permission to do this.

option_use_dark_icon_desc.message: This will make our toolbar icon a dark gray.

panel_cant_sign_in.message: Can't get signed in? Try temporarily disabling Adblock. If that doesn't help, Pushbullet requires third-party cookies to be enabled to sign in. You can disable them again after getting signed-in.

panel_third_party_cookies.message: Click here for how to change this setting.

pushbullet_pro_feature.message: Pushbullet Pro is required to enable this feature.

reply_limit_reached.message: You've reached the free message limit for this month.

reply_limit_upgrade.message: Upgrade to Pushbullet Pro to send unlimited messages.

reply_limit_warning.message: You're getting close to the free message limit for this month.

sms_disclaimer.message: Phone must be powered on and have an internet connection for the texts to send.

sms_no_devices_text.message: No Android devices have SMS sync enabled. To enable SMS, open the Pushbullet Android app and enable the top option on the SMS tab.

thanks_for_installing_message.message: Click here to get signed in

updated_notif_message.message: Click here to see what's new
